THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: Thumbnail uses a provocative, curiosity-inducing question in large, attention-grabbing text, directly referencing pleasure and comparison, matching the theme of the video title focused on 'चरमसुख का रास्ता कौन-सा है' (Which path leads to ultimate pleasure/excitement?). The presence of Dr. Neha Mehta signals expert advice, reinforcing the title's authoritative aspect.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: No major mismatch. Both thumbnail and title use curiosity and directness to hook the audience. Thumbnail is a bit more playful/provocative than the relatively neutral/educational video title.
